article_title: How About Cutting Attorneys' Fees From The Next NFL Concussion Settlement?

article_metadata.author: Roger Groves

og.description: Another lawsuit has been filed by former NFL players against the NFL for uncompensated concussion-related injuries. It’s time to step back from this one and view where we are to date. The largest such suit started with the former players requesting about $2 billion. The NFL’s initial response was: “How [...]
